name: Shadows of the Dead
description:
On a keyboard use Arrow Keys to move the character.

On a Touch Device,  Touch on the up right corner in the Menu to activate the on screen Joystick that can be used to control the character.

After each Level the game Saves your progress. To continue a saved game on the title screen Click Continue.

It is the year 1349, most of Europe is suffering from the Black Death.
A plague that has killed millions.

In the Black Forest Germany an Evil Necromancer is resurrecting the dead and spread more suffering through the world.

The only standing between total Chaos is young girl on a flying Broomstick.
